### Plugin Details
- **Plugin Name**: 
- **Plugin UUID**: 
- **Plugin Version**: 

### Checklist

Before submitting your plugin, please ensure you have completed the following:

- [ ] Generated a unique UUID4 for the plugin and set it in `__plugin_uuid__`
- [ ] Set a descriptive name in `__plugin_name__`
- [ ] Set the initial version in `__plugin_version__` (e.g., "0.1.0")
- [ ] Set your name in `__plugin_author__`
- [ ] I understand that the plugin website URL will be set to the GitHub repository URL upon acceptance
- [ ] Defined configuration schema in `__plugin_config__` (if applicable)
- [ ] Defined entity parameters in `__plugin_entity_parameters__` (if applicable)
- [ ] Created a `.md` documentation file next to the plugin file
- [ ] Tested the plugin with photoserv
- [ ] Added appropriate logging statements
- [ ] Raised exceptions on errors to mark runs as unsuccessful
